mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PA.ipayment) FROM t_payment PA JOIN t_product_payment PP ON PA.ipayment = PP.ipayment JOIN t_product P ON PP.iproduct = P.iproduct WHERE PA.ibuyer = #{iuser} OR P.iuser = #{iuser} AND PA.istatus = -4

SELECT if(P.iuser = #{iuser}, PA.ibuyer, if(PA.ibuyer = 1, P.iuser, 0)) as difIuser, COUNT(R.ireview) AS reviewCount FROM t_product_payment PP JOIN t_payment PA ON PP.ipayment = PA.ipayment JOIN t_product P ON PP.iproduct = P.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_review R ON PA.ipayment = R.ipayment WHERE PA.ipayment = #{ipayment}
